name: reverse_string
description: Reverses the characters in a string while optionally stripping spaces, preserving special characters' positions, and keeping specified substrings in their original places.

text.description: The input string to be reversed.

strip_spaces.description: If true, removes extra spaces from the string before reversing.

preserve_special_chars.description: If true, preserves the positions of non-alphabetic characters while reversing only letters.

keep_segments_in_place.description: A list of specific substrings that should remain in their original positions during reversal.
